title: Circuit Breaker Meta-Schema
description: Schema for defining circuit breaker patterns to prevent cascading failures

failure_threshold.description: Number of consecutive failures to trigger circuit breaker

success_threshold.description: Number of consecutive successes to close circuit breaker

recovery_timeout.description: Time to wait before attempting recovery (e.g., '30s', '5m')

health_check_interval.description: How often to check service health during recovery

slow_call_duration_threshold.description: Duration threshold to consider a call 'slow'

slow_call_rate_threshold.description: Percentage of slow calls to trigger circuit breaker (0.0-1.0)
